name: Angry Starships
description:
Created by Aleksander Cylwik, Bryan Soto, and Andrew Ward.

==========================================================

Description:

This game aims to create a casual yet puzzling experience. Play as a spaceship with vertical movement controls, and fire missiles to destroy enemies. Enemies can be destroyed by direct missile impact or crushed by debris.  Larger planets have gravity and will pull smaller objects towards them, including your missiles.

==========================================================

Controls:

Move Up: W or Up Arrow

Move Down: S or Down Arrow

Fire Missile: Space Bar

Open Menu: Escape

==========================================================

Roles:

Programmer &  level designer: Aleksander Cylwik

Artist: Bryan Soto

Main Menus Artist & Level Designer: Andrew Ward
